title: Assertion failed when recompiling

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
When using nightly builds version `rustc 1.53.0-nightly (7f4afdf02 2021-04-22)` the compiler panics. This seems to happen only after doing a full build, then changing something and recompiling.

I'm compiling in release but using the following settings:

```
[profile.release]
opt-level = "s"
debug = true
codegen-units = 256
incremental = true
lto = false
```

without the incremental flag the error goes away also this doesn't happen on latest stable 1.51

### Error output

```
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: `(left == right)`
  left: `Some(Fingerprint(8537439170242672706, 4648092694241280842))`,
 right: `Some(Fingerprint(212923312148573672, 18320173992410164289))`: found unstable fingerprints for evaluate_obligation(5ecf1a33cd5f9fb-1e2c959c25212356): Ok(EvaluatedToOk)', /rustc/7f4afdf0255600306bf67432da722c7b5d2cbf82/compiler/rustc_query_system/src/query/plumbing.rs:593:5
stack backtrace:
   0: rust_begin_unwind
             at /rustc/7f4afdf0255600306bf67432da722c7b5d2cbf82/library/std/src/panicking.rs:493:5
   1: core::panicking::panic_fmt
             at /rustc/7f4afdf0255600306bf67432da722c7b5d2cbf82/library/core/src/panicking.rs:92:14
   2: core::panicking::assert_failed_inner
   3: core::panicking::assert_failed
   4: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::incremental_verify_ich
   5: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::load_from_disk_and_cache_in_memory
   6: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack
   7: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl
   8: <rustc_query_impl::Queries as rustc_middle::ty::query::QueryEngine>::evaluate_obligation
   9: <rustc_infer::infer::InferCtxt as rustc_trait_selection::traits::query::evaluate_obligation::InferCtxtExt>::evaluate_obligation
  10: <rustc_infer::infer::InferCtxt as rustc_trait_selection::traits::query::evaluate_obligation::InferCtxtExt>::evaluate_obligation_no_overflow
  11: rustc_trait_selection::traits::type_known_to_meet_bound_modulo_regions
  12: rustc_infer::infer::InferCtxtBuilder::enter
  13: rustc_ty_utils::common_traits::is_freeze_raw
  14: rustc_middle::dep_graph::<impl rustc_query_system::dep_graph::DepKind for rustc_middle::dep_graph::dep_node::DepKind>::with_deps
  15: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::load_from_disk_and_cache_in_memory
  16: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack
  17: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl
  18: <rustc_query_impl::Queries as rustc_middle::ty::query::QueryEngine>::is_freeze_raw
  19: rustc_middle::ty::util::<impl rustc_middle::ty::TyS>::is_freeze
  20: rustc_middle::ty::layout::<impl rustc_target::abi::TyAndLayoutMethods<C> for &rustc_middle::ty::TyS>::pointee_info_at
  21: rustc_middle::ty::layout::<impl rustc_target::abi::TyAndLayoutMethods<C> for &rustc_middle::ty::TyS>::pointee_info_at
  22: <rustc_target::abi::TyAndLayout<&rustc_middle::ty::TyS> as rustc_codegen_llvm::type_of::LayoutLlvmExt>::pointee_info_at
  23: <rustc_target::abi::TyAndLayout<&rustc_middle::ty::TyS> as rustc_codegen_llvm::type_of::LayoutLlvmExt>::scalar_llvm_type_at
  24: rustc_codegen_llvm::type_of::uncached_llvm_type
  25: <rustc_target::abi::TyAndLayout<&rustc_middle::ty::TyS> as rustc_codegen_llvm::type_of::LayoutLlvmExt>::llvm_type
  26: rustc_codegen_llvm::type_of::struct_llfields
  27: <rustc_target::abi::TyAndLayout<&rustc_middle::ty::TyS> as rustc_codegen_llvm::type_of::LayoutLlvmExt>::llvm_type
  28: <rustc_target::abi::call::FnAbi<&rustc_middle::ty::TyS> as rustc_codegen_llvm::abi::FnAbiLlvmExt>::llvm_type
  29: rustc_codegen_llvm::mono_item::<impl rustc_codegen_ssa::traits::declare::PreDefineMethods for rustc_codegen_llvm::context::CodegenCx>::predefine_fn
  30: rustc_codegen_llvm::base::compile_codegen_unit::module_codegen
  31: rustc_middle::dep_graph::<impl rustc_query_system::dep_graph::DepKind for rustc_middle::dep_graph::dep_node::DepKind>::with_deps
  32: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph<K>::with_task
  33: rustc_codegen_llvm::base::compile_codegen_unit
  34: rustc_codegen_ssa::base::codegen_crate
  35: <rustc_codegen_llvm::LlvmCodegenBackend as rustc_codegen_ssa::traits::backend::CodegenBackend>::codegen_crate
  36: rustc_interface::passes::QueryContext::enter
  37: rustc_interface::queries::Queries::ongoing_codegen
  38: rustc_interface::queries::<impl rustc_interface::interface::Compiler>::enter
  39: rustc_span::with_source_map
  40: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run
  41: scoped_tls::ScopedKey<T>::set
note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace.

error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md

note: rustc 1.53.0-nightly (7f4afdf02 2021-04-22) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu

note: compiler flags: -C opt-level=s -C embed-bitcode=no -C codegen-units=256 -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type lib

note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden

query stack during panic:
#0 [evaluate_obligation] evaluating trait selection obligation `rin_math::Point<f32, rin_math::U3>: std::marker::Freeze`
#1 [is_freeze_raw] computing whether `rin_math::Point<f32, rin_math::U3>` is freeze
end of query stack
```
